title: The Sediment problem
creator_credit: University of Strathclyde and Gordon Thomas
brief_description: An examination of the detrimental depletion of soil resources from the land by natural means and by man’s intervention. Shot at a number of locations in the Scottish Highlands and the Clyde Valley. Intended for students of civil engineering.
description: An examination of the detrimental depletion of soil resources from the land by natural means and by man’s intervention. Shot at a number of locations in the Scottish Highlands and the Clyde Valley. Intended for students of civil engineering.
